trends: There has been one other sighting in Clayton
There were no other sightings in Clayton on or around April 6th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThe movement you see is my husband not having a steady hand.....the object stayed in the same place until it disappeared. It did seem to rotate...... We saw it for about 20 minutes, but it could have been there longer. When it disappeared it was just gone from one minute to the next. I would appreciate if you would let me know what you think it was.... We were on our porch, at first I thought it was a bright star, but then I decided it was WAY to big for a star, so we got the video camera. My husband did nothing to the video except zoom in on the images. Steffi Smith
Summary: I am enclosing a video, you decide what shape
